content.value:
In this week's episode, Rodrigo Mendoza-Smith (@r0dms) fills us in about Quine (@quine_sh), a data-driven professional network for software creators and, @GitNFT, an NFT minting platform for GitHub commits.

ðŸŽ§ at podcast.sustainoss.org/106

#opensource #sustain #NFTCommunity

content.html: My personal opinion: NFTs and sustainability do not go together. Building sustainable ecosystems that support the creation and maintenance of #OpenSource is important. But "Maximising the GDP of software creators" is an anti-goal, and is unlikely to be sustainable economics.
content.value:
My personal opinion: NFTs and sustainability do not go together.

Building sustainable ecosystems that support the creation and maintenance of #OpenSource is important.  

But "Maximising the GDP of software creators" is an anti-goal, and is unlikely to be sustainable economics.
